state: You are now playing a profound round of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First of all, pick up the key from the stand inside the cellar. If you can get your hands on the key, take a trip north. After that, check that the locker is unlocked with the key. After unlocking the locker, open the locker in the cookery. Then, recover the formless key from the locker. With the formless key, unlock the formless gateway with the formless key. After you have unlocked the formless gateway, open the formless gateway in the cookery. After pulling open the formless gateway, travel north. If you can succeed at that, head north. Then, make an effort to venture east. Then, make an effort to head east. After that, try to head east. With that done, venture east. After that, recover the salad from the floor of the recreation zone. Once that's all handled, you can stop! -= Cellar =- This just in- You, in the cellar. Look over there! a stand. You see a key on the stand. There is an unguarded exit to the north. > -= Cellar =-0/1
next_state: You take the key from the stand. > -= Cellar =-0/2
